topics.body:
I was coming up with a time wasting mecha

I've come up with two components so far

Pegasus' mech would be a winged crocodile that forms the backpack and wings

Squiggy's would be a bear that splits and forms the legs or feet 
[spoiler]cuz he a power bottom[/spoiler]
